markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Efreeti Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2560) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The magic of your [efreeti](/Monsters.aspx?ID=214) ancestors flows through you. You can cast [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) and [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.
name: Efreeti Magic
